name: The Infinite Black 2
description:
The wildly popular online space adventure returns with a gorgeous new sequel!

Captain a fleet of ships to hunt aliens, trade resources, loot treasure and earn thousands of achievements.

Form powerful corporations with your friends, build shipyards, then fight a never-ending intergalactic war!

A single cross-platform server connects thousands of players on all desktop and mobile devices.

All platform downloads and more at https://www.TIB2.com

Join us on Discord for dev chats and launch events! https://discord.gg/UGpMMde2pU
